title: New install is stuck at 74% on Mac
body: stuck on it for about 15 minutes now, any help please?

replies.body: At this point in the process, the patcher is downloading game files and updates but is being blocked.  Go over each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure you've got a steady network to maintain a connection.  Make sure to select Mac for instructions specific to your OS.  Let me know if you have any questions!
